WorkItem.Description:
I want to know if the Bonus of Tier 14 is implemented in the currently version of Rawr for the Mages.
I ask this because in all the optimization rawr undervalue the Tier, i checked in the Buff's tab, and when I equip 2 or 4 piece of the set, the Bonus is automatically checked, but there is no effect on the final DPS.
Thanks in advice for the answers.

Comments.Message: It is very sad. It appears to be broken. I cant even get it to register that I have a 4 piece on, let alone for it to correctly calculate the bonus. For now, it definitely seems to be undervaluing the tier. I am surprised nobody else is commenting on this.
Please try Rawr 5.0.4, MageT14 should be fixed there.
Nevermind, I still see the issue in 5.0.4. I'll look to see if it can get fixed for 5.0.5.

T14 set bonus works in 5.0.4 as long as you make sure the set bonus name is listed in the item config. Unfortunately, using "refresh from wowhead" clears that field so you have to add it back by hand.
